title: #118: Debunking The Left's Kavanaugh Lies
text:
The Left is going after Supreme Court Justice Brett Kavanaugh. Again. Two reporters from The New York Times present a new "bombshell" allegation in an op-ed and their new book. However, the allegation is, once again, another uncorroborated, despicable smear against an honorable man. The New York Times is already facing backlash after having to issue a correction to the op-ed after it left out key information. Matt and Storm break down all the baseless allegations against Justice Kavanaugh and present the evidence you won't hear from the mainstream media.

Text to TRIGGERED to 88022 to join us in supporting Team Trump.
description: The Left is going after Supreme Court Justice Brett Kavanaugh.
